price: Warra jaartiiwwan isaanii irraa kakataniif ji’oota afur eeguutu isaan irra jira. Yoo irraa deebi’an dhugumatti Rabbiin akkaan araaramaa, rahmata godhaadha.
arabic: لِّلَّذِينَ يُؤۡلُونَ مِن نِّسَآئِهِمۡ تَرَبُّصُ أَرۡبَعَةِ أَشۡهُرٖۖ فَإِن فَآءُو فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: lilladhīna yu'lūna min nisāihim tarabbuṣu arbaʿati ashhurin fa-in fāū fa-inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
